statement.name: INSERT_SMARBR
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smarbr( codcia, nrorbr, codrbr, nomrbr, npqrbr, nvlrbr, auxrbr, tporbr, dpnrbr, codpqk, tpopgs, clrrbr, iderbr, tiprbr, sqvrbr, sqkrbr, prvrbr, prkrbr, vewrbr, sqlbkr , cxmrbr) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMARBR
statement.sql: UPDATE smarbr SET codcia=?, codrbr=?, nomrbr=?, npqrbr=?, nvlrbr=?, auxrbr=?, tporbr=?, dpnrbr=?, codpqk=?, tpopgs=?, clrrbr=?, iderbr=?, tiprbr=?, sqvrbr=?, sqkrbr=?, prvrbr=?, prkrbr=?, vewrbr=?, sqlbkr=? , cxmrbr =? WHERE nrorbr=?
